txt.en: Two Orc armies inhabit the Circle of Wrath in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should venture forth and defeat goblin-scouts within the encampments.

'There are fewer goblin-scouts about? Then I am pleased! I cannot stand them, and now I need not! The Circle of Wrath remains dangerous, but it will be easier for the Rangers to move about unseen, which is very important. Please accept my thanks.'

'Goblin-scouts. I hate them, you hate them, what more needs be said? They are a threat to our position here, and must be defeated. Will you see it done? I am not particular: scouts from either encampment will do.'
Return to Thornaran and tell him you defeated goblin-scouts in the Circle of Wrath.
Two forces of Orcs fortify the outer ring of Minas Morgul, and their goblin scouts are a threat to all who seek to move within the city.
Circle of Wrath: Scourging the Scouts
